Summary: stationary, blink off and on, dissapeard sometimes, red/white lights, visable for aobut 10 minutes
divs: Sighting DetailsWe where taking a walk outside my neighborhood and then we saw this small stationary light, that was red and white. At first, I thought it was a plane but then i went inside my house and took binoculars and sat outside looking at this object. When I first saw it, it was so bright, and blinking everynow and then, not typical of a plane that sits in one place. I also had notcied that it revolved around in circles similar to spinning, which made me think, "mhmm this is interesting." Basically when i sat outside watching, the object would remain visable for about 10 minutes and then dissapper for about 5 min. Then it would reapper off and on. This lasted for about 50 min. I think that this is definetly a UFO and I actually tried calling the Franlkin Institute in Philadelphia to report this sighting, however, they were closed. Finally, after the 50 minutes, its dissappeared and i went inside. Who knows, it could even be out there right now.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wyndmoor
There were no other sightings in Wyndmoor on or around October 18th 2008
